scripts.build: npm run cleanDist && npx tsc --project tsconfig.ifd.json && shx cp ./src/package.json ./tmp/ && node --experimental-modules --import=specifier-resolution-node/register tmp/index_ifd.js && npm run cleanTmp && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:debug: npm run cleanDist && npx tsc --project tsconfig.ifd.json && shx cp ./src/package.json ./tmp/ && node --experimental-modules --import=specifier-resolution-node/register tmp/index_ifd.js && npm run cleanTmp && npx webpack --config webpack-debug.config.js
